name: The Mad Bulleteer
description:
Description:
You are the Mad Bulleteer. Nothing makes you happier than producing bullets. And you are good at it too. But other bullet producers are tired of your success, and have rallied together to stop you. You must hold out as long as you can and produce as many bullets as possible!

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 41 Compo in April of 2018. The theme of the jam was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 1030 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 1053.821Fun403.976Innovation 2363.583Theme1583.952Graphics3643.202Audio3502.793Humor 4822.221Mood4712.782
